public class Boss extends GameCharacter
Class for the boss character at the last level

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Boss

      public Boss​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      The constructor of the boss character.
      参数:
      world - the interactable world
      colNum - the column number
      rowNum - the row number

  • 方法详细资料

    • drawOn

      public void drawOn​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      The specific method that implement the abstract method in GameObject, draw graphics content on GraphicsContext For boss character, a health point indicator will be drawn on the top of the hero. Three color indicates corresponding value range
      • 0-1000: red
      • 1000-2500: orange
      • 2500-5000: green
      覆盖:
      drawOn 在类中 GameCharacter
      参数:
      gc - graphic context

    • RandomReverseDirection

      private void RandomReverseDirection()
      The method to randomly reverse the direction.

    • die

      void die()
      The method for boss to die.

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(Hero hero)
      Method handling collision with hero.
      参数:
      hero - the hero object

    • update

      public void update()
      Method handling update of boss
      覆盖:
      update 在类中 GameObject

    • updateWithDifficulty

      private void updateWithDifficulty​(String difficulty)
      Method to update boss according to the difficulty Three difficulties will consider three kinds of attribute altering methodology
      1. Easy: the change movement possibility of the boss is set to 0.005
      2. Medium: the change movement possibility of the boss is set to 0.01
      3. Hard: the change movement possibility of the boss is set to 0.02
      参数:
      difficulty - current difficulty for the interactable world

    • X_terminal_speed_difficulty

      private void X_terminal_speed_difficulty​(String Difficulty)
      Set the terminal_xVelocity according to game difficulty
      参数:
      Difficulty - the current game difficulty

    • jump

      private void jump()
      Method for boss to jump, changing three attributes of the boss
      1. the y coordinate
      2. the y velocity
      3. the attribute of whether the item is on the platform

    • collideWithFloor

      public void collideWithFloor()
      Methods for handling collision with floor.
      指定者:
      collideWithFloor 在类中 GameObject

    • collideWithCeiling

      public void collideWithCeiling()
      Methods for handling collision with ceiling
      指定者:
      collideWithCeiling 在类中 GameObject

    • collideWithWall

      public void collideWithWall()
      Methods for handling collision with wall
      指定者:
      collideWithWall 在类中 GameObject

    • collideWithProjectile

      public void collideWithProjectile()
      Methods for handling collision with projectile (for boss) when boss collide with projectile, the following situation will happen:
      1. the health points of the boss will be declined by 50
      2. if the health points of the boss is less than zero, boss died

    • getHP

      public int getHP()
      Method to get the health point of the boss
      返回:
      the hp point in int type

    • HPProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty HPProperty()
      Method to get the property of the health point
      另请参阅:
      getHP(), setHP(int)

    • setHP

      public void setHP​(int HP)
      Method to set the health point of the boss
      参数:
      HP - the detailed health point value parameter in int type
